name: Shockproof hybrid cover with a modern touch for iPhone 13 Pro - Black
description: This is a new, modern and updated version of its predacessor, with a slick look and improved all around. Its assymetric design allows for better grip when holding the phone, and the adapted kickstand fits into the cover's ensamble. It has two flat surfaces, allowing the phone to stand either vertically or horizontally on its own - the future truly is now.
